name: 無機化學實驗
description:
1. To train students to have the basic concepts of inorganic reactions. 
2. Learn the Schlenk Techniques. 
3. The basic concept of geometric isomerism of inorganic complexes. 
4. The basic concept of solvent binding 
5. The basic concept of oxidation addition of complexes.
goals: To train students to have the basic concepts of inorganic reactions.
The basic concept of geometric isomerism of inorganic complexes.
The basic concept of solvent binding
The basic concept of oxidation addition of complexes
syllabus:
Exp.1 鎳錯合物\[Ni(CH3CN)6\](ClO4)2的合成  
Exp2 鈷錯合物cis/trans-\[Co(en)2Cl2\]Cl的合成  
Exp3 銅錯合物\[Cu(H2O)6\](BF4)2/\[Cu(CH3CN)4\](BF4)之製備  
Exp4 鐵錯合物Ferrocene的製備  
Exp.5 鐵錯合物\[Fe(CO)4H\](PPN)的合成  
Exp.6鐵錯合物\[Fe(CO)3(SePh)3\](PPN)的合成
